Phrase en Anglais: I am Alfesar, a friar from the San d'Oria Cathedral. I have come to study the Altepa Desert and its surroundings.${prompt}

Until only recently, the monster-infested Korroloka Tunnel has been a barrier between the Quon continent and Zepwell Island. But with the clearing of that tunnel, I was able to make my way here.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: I am Alfesar, a friar from the San d'Oria Cathedral. I have come to study the Altepa Desert and its surroundings.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: On your way here to Rabao, I'm sure you saw the ruins of ages past half-buried in the sand. I have been given the task of investigating those ruins.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Until only recently, the monster-infested Korroloka Tunnel has been a barrier between the Quon continent and Zepwell Island. But with the clearing of that tunnel, I was able to make my way here.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: Several days ago, a researcher I hired brought back ${keyitem-article: 0[2]} inscribed with ancient writings. He found it in the expansive Quicksand Caves that lie beneath the Altepa Desert.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: On your way here to Rabao, I'm sure you saw the ruins of ages past half-buried in the sand. I have been given the task of investigating those ruins.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: This was a major discovery. According to a scholar of ancient literature, the inscription on the tablet appears to be some kind of spell.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Several days ago, a researcher I hired brought back ${keyitem-article: 0[2]} inscribed with ancient writings. He found it in the expansive Quicksand Caves that lie beneath the Altepa Desert.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: Unfortunately, with an important part of the tablet broken away, we were unable to decipher the full meaning.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: This was a major discovery. According to a scholar of ancient literature, the inscription on the tablet appears to be some kind of spell.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: I am still undergoing training and do not possess the ability to survive a foray into a place like the Quicksand Caves. And so, I turn to you.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Unfortunately, with an important part of the tablet broken away, we were unable to decipher the full meaning.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: ${name-player}, you are highly regarded as an accomplished adventurer. I wish to employ you to venture into the Quicksand Caves and find the remaining ${keyitem-singular: 0[2]}.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: I am still undergoing training and do not possess the ability to survive a foray into a place like the Quicksand Caves. And so, I turn to you.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: I humbly beg this favor of you.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: ${name-player}, you are highly regarded as an accomplished adventurer. I wish to employ you to venture into the Quicksand Caves and find the remaining ${keyitem-singular: 0[2]}.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: The tablet I have was found in the Quicksand Caves that lie beneath the Altepa Desert. The ${keyitem-singular: 0[2]} will most likely be among other rubble and debris.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: I humbly beg this favor of you.${prompt}
The tablet I have was found in the Quicksand Caves that lie beneath the Altepa Desert. The ${keyitem-singular: 0[2]} will most likely be among other rubble and debris.${prompt}

Please take the completed ${keyitem-singular: 1[2]} and this letter of introduction.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: The desert is crossed by all sorts of people, not just you adventurers. Like us caravan merchants, for instance.${prompt}
Sometimes we gotta dump our goods and run like hell when we get attacked by monsters out there. Your life is the most valuable thing ya got, pal.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: The desert is crossed by all sorts of people, not just you adventurers. Like us caravan merchants, for instance.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: Some of the more nasty critters out there are those huge scorpions. They gotta be more'n twice my height, and naturally the sting in the tail'll shoot ya full of poison.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Sometimes we gotta dump our goods and run like hell when we get attacked by monsters out there. Your life is the most valuable thing ya got, pal.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: Those scorpions are a real pain in the backside, if ya get my meaning. It's fine if ya happen to be best friends with a white mage, but out here you'll find more bruisers than healers. If ya don't got a good stock of antidotes, you're a dead man.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Some of the more nasty critters out there are those huge scorpions. They gotta be more'n twice my height, and naturally the sting in the tail'll shoot ya full of poison.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: 'Course, the main ingredient for that antidote just happens to be ${article} ${item-article: 1[2]}.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Those scorpions are a real pain in the backside, if ya get my meaning. It's fine if ya happen to be best friends with a white mage, but out here you'll find more bruisers than healers. If ya don't got a good stock of antidotes, you're a dead man.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: An adventurer like yourself should see where I'm going with this. I want ya to go out and get me ${article} ${item-article: 1[2]}.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: 'Course, the main ingredient for that antidote just happens to be ${article} ${item-article: 1[2]}.${prompt}
An adventurer like yourself should see where I'm going with this. I want ya to go out and get me ${article} ${item-article: 1[2]}.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: Oh, I really thought ya would've helped us out...
Well, sorry for taking up ya time.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Oh, I really thought ya would've helped us out...
Well, sorry for taking up ya time.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: Now get out there, whack some of them scorpions, and bring me ${article} ${item-article: 1[2]}. I'll have ya reward waiting for ya.${prompt}

Phrase en Français: Now get out there, whack some of them scorpions, and bring me ${article} ${item-article: 1[2]}. I'll have ya reward waiting for ya.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: I won't bore ya with a long speech. If ya feel up to getting us some ${item-singular: 1[2]}, I'll be standing right here.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: Now I can make me some antidote. Thanks, pal.
